desc: Giving Tree Village Rotary Club of Davidson Lake Norman Christmas in Davidson Fundraiser

layout.text: VOTING IS OVER! THANK YOU FOR JOINING US IN 2021! PLEASE DO NOT VOTE. PLEASE GO DIRECTLY TO YOUR FAVORITE NON PROFIT FOR ANY OF YOUR GENEROUS GIVING. SEE YOU IN 2022!!! Welcome To The Giving Tree Village!

This unique, festive fundraising village is located in Davidson, North Carolina during Christmas in Davidson. Our Giving Tree Village highlights non-profits & local businesses as they team up to create this community event. Last year, through the generous contributions of the visitors & sponsors, Rotary Club of Davidson distributed over $48,000 to local charities!  Our goal is to raise $70,000 in 2021! 
Thank you for joining in. All voting will be online this year!  To vote simply buy votes for your favorite tree via the catalog on this website. The non profits receive 100% of your giving! Tickets will be sold in increments of $5 each.  Each ticket is a "vote" for your favorite tree or non-profit.  Buy as many tickets as you are able. For some of these non-profits, this is the largest fundraiser they will have all year.
The Rotary Club of Davidson gives additional prizes to the top 3 vote getters & we have superlative prizes for prettiest, most fun & most creative! Thank you for supporting this amazing fundraiser during the most wonderful time of the year!
VOTE FOR YOUR FAVORITE TREE HERE
